text: Katherine Nicole McKibbin (September 28, 1978 â€“ November 1, 2020) was an American rock music singer-songwriter. She finished third in the debut season of the reality television series American Idol. McKibbin appeared in the first season of Popstars."VIEW; 'Survivor' for Stardom", Lynn Harris, The New York Times, March 11, 2001. McKibbin was born in Grand Prairie, Texas. McKibbin died on November 1, 2020 from a brain aneurysm at a hospital in Arlington, Texas. She was 42 years old at the time. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from intracranial aneurysm Category:American rock singers Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Singers from Texas Category:Writers from Texas
title: Nikki McKibbin
